bug.short_desc: Invalid suggestion for Selenium CLASSPATH setting for Simulator

long_desc.thetext:
http://manual.qooxdoo.org/current/pages/desktop/tutorials/tutorial-part-4-4-1.html#test-configuration-settings
The suggested file glob "libs/*" doesn't work at the moment. What does work is an explicit listing of all .jar files like
"let" : { "SIMULATOR_CLASSPATH" : [ /* "../selenium/selenium-java-client-driver.jar", */
"../selenium/selenium-java-2.24.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/apache-mime4j-0.6.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-logging-1.1.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/httpmime-4.1.3.jar", "../selenium/libs/operadriver-0.14.jar", "../selenium/libs/bsh-1.3.0.jar", "../selenium/libs/cssparser-0.9.5.jar", "../selenium/libs/ini4j-0.5.2.jar", "../selenium/libs/protobuf-java-2.4.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/cglib-nodep-2.1_3.jar", "../selenium/libs/guava-12.0.jar", "../selenium/libs/jcommander-1.13.jar", "../selenium/libs/sac-1.3.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-codec-1.6.jar", "../selenium/libs/hamcrest-core-1.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/jna-3.4.0.jar", "../selenium/libs/serializer-2.7.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-collections-3.2.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/hamcrest-library-1.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/jna-platform-3.4.0.jar", "../selenium/libs/testng-6.0.1-nobsh-noguice.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-exec-1.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/htmlunit-2.9.jar", "../selenium/libs/json-20080701.jar", "../selenium/libs/webbit-0.4.8-SNAPSHOT.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-io-2.0.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/htmlunit-core-js-2.9.jar", "../selenium/libs/junit-dep-4.10.jar", "../selenium/libs/xalan-2.7.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-jxpath-1.3.jar", "../selenium/libs/httpclient-4.1.3.jar", "../selenium/libs/nekohtml-1.9.15.jar", "../selenium/libs/xercesImpl-2.9.1.jar", "../selenium/libs/commons-lang-2.6.jar", "../selenium/libs/httpcore-4.1.3.jar", "../selenium/libs/netty-3.2.7.Final.jar", "../selenium/libs/xml-apis-1.3.04.jar", "../rhino/js.jar" ] },
Should work now, with the resolution of its blocker bug#6585.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
